component.name: Minus Games Client
component.summary: Download, sync and run a game

description.p: The Minus Games Client offers an efficient solution for downloading, synchronizing, and running your games. It keeps your game files managed and up-to-date with the latest patches and updates from a Minus Games Server Instance. With seamless synchronization across devices, you can effortlessly continue your progress no matter where you are. This setup ensures a reliable and straightforward way to enhance and manage your gaming experience.
